document_data.name: ''Bulette-Claw Spear''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bulette-claw spears''''' were dangerous types of [[spear]]s, one of which belonged to [[Raika]] a [[Reghedmen]] [[barbarian]] adventurer active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Bulette-claw spears'' were large two-handed [[polearm]]s with slender and sharp edges.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Bulette-claw spear raika.jpg|thumb|''Raika, wielding a bulette-claw spear.'']]
These spears rendered and tore its targets, leaving them with debilitating bleeding wounds.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Raika]]: a [[half-orc]] [[barbarian]] who worked with other warriors of [[Waterdeep]], performing missions on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
